url.imageAlt: A front-row view of an orchestra playing at the Windsor Capitol Theatre
A balcony view of a conductor and orchestra standing for an ovation at the Windsor Capitol Theatre
A street view of the ornate outside of the Windsor Capitol Theatre lit by poster boxes on a rainy night
A lit chandelier hangs in the lobby of the Windsor Capitol Theatre showcasing ornate gold, green, and red ceiling and wall details
A nine piece band consisting of a singer, saxophone player, violinist, bassist, two keyboard players, and two guitarists play on the Windsor Capitol Theatre stage
A vintage gold chandelier hangs from an ornate red and green base with gold moulding from the ceiling of the lobby
A large cast of ballet dancers are gathered on stage to pose for a photo
A person is stood on a balcony overlooking the Detroit River and the surrounding buildings lit up at night
A view of the moulding and artwork on the ceiling and walls of the Windsor Capitol Theatre
A street view of the ornate outside of the Windsor Capitol Theatre
